message.content:
**Verse 1**  
Yo, waddlin’ on the ice, lookin’ so fly,  
In my tuxedo suit, I’m the coolest guy,  
From the South Pole chillin’, where the snowflakes fall,  
Got my crew by my side, we’re the kings of it all.  

Slide on the belly, yeah, we’re glidin’ with style,  
Fishin’ in the ocean, we can swim for a mile,  
Dancin’ on the ice, doin’ our little jig,  
With a heart so big, we’re livin’ life big.  

**Chorus**  
Penguins in the house, we’re the icy elite,  
Waddle to the beat, feel the rhythm in your feet,  
From the icebergs to the sea, we’re livin’ so free,  
Penguins on the scene, come and vibe with me!  

**Verse 2**  
Huddled up tight when the winter winds blow,  
Keepin’ it warm, that’s how we roll, yo,  
Parents takin’ turns, watchin’ over the eggs,  
Teamwork makes the dream work, we’re all about the pegs.  

Got my little chicks, they’re the future of the crew,  
Teachin’ ‘em to swim, yeah, that’s what we do,  
From the icy waters to the snowy shores,  
We’re the penguin fam, hear our mighty roars!  

**Chorus**  
Penguins in the house, we’re the icy elite,  
Waddle to the beat, feel the rhythm in your feet,  
From the icebergs to the sea, we’re livin’ so free,  
Penguins on the scene, come and vibe with me!  

**Bridge**  
So if you see us comin’, better step aside,  
We’re the coolest birds, got that penguin pride,  
With our flippers flappin’, we’re the life of the party,  
In this frozen world, we’re livin’ hearty!  

**Outro**  
So raise your flippers high, let’s celebrate,  
Penguin life is good, can’t underestimate,  
From the ice to the sea, we’re the kings of the chill,  
Waddlin’ through life, yeah, we’re keepin’ it real!  

**Chorus**  
Penguins in the house, we’re the icy elite,  
Waddle to the beat, feel the rhythm in your feet,  
From the icebergs to the sea, we’re livin’ so free,  
Penguins on the scene, come and vibe with me!
